channel.title: Palindrome on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Palindrome on Hashnopolis

item.title: Valid Palindrome
item.description: Given a string, determine if it is a palindrome, considering only alphanumeric characters and ignoring cases. Note: For the purpose of this problem, we define empty string as valid palindrome. Example 1: Input: "A man, a plan, a canal: Panama" Output: true Example 2: Input: "race a car" Output: false Solution: class Solution: def isPalindrome(self, s): """ :type s: str :rtype: bool """ if not s: return True head = 0 tail = len(s) - 1 while head <= tail: cHead, cTail = s[head], s[tail] if not cHead.
